story_arceus_06_03000/2401_1001_0100_10: What? Volo was talking with Team Rocket?!
story_arceus_06_03000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Yeah. It seemed like he was just selling
Team Rocket his wares.
story_arceus_06_03000/2401_1001_0300_10:
And although that’s frowned upon, it’s not
necessarily bad.
story_arceus_06_03000/2401_1001_0400_10:
But for some reason, my International Police
officer intuition tells me something’s up.
story_arceus_06_03000/2401_1001_0600_10: I’ve decided to keep a close eye on him.
story_arceus_06_03000/2401_1001_0700_10:
So...the International Police will officially
be monitoring him?
story_arceus_06_03000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Yup. We don’t have any concrete evidence,
though, so we’ll have to be discreet.
story_arceus_06_03000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Volo may not look it, but I hear he’s the
wary type. He might shake me if I try to
tail him.
story_arceus_06_03000/2401_1001_1100_10:
My boss is also taking action, but you should
still be careful, Paulo.
story_arceus_06_03000/2401_1001_1300_10: (This is gonna put Rei in a tough spot.)
